price: Lalle waɗanda suka kãfirta, anã kiran su, "Haƙĩƙa, ƙin Allah (a gare ku) shĩ ne mafi girma daga ƙinku ga kanku a lõkacin da ake kiran ku zuwa ga ĩmãni, sai kunã ta kãfircẽwa."
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ يُنَادَوۡنَ لَمَقۡتُ ٱللَّهِ أَكۡبَرُ مِن مَّقۡتِكُمۡ أَنفُسَكُمۡ إِذۡ تُدۡعَوۡنَ إِلَى ٱلۡإِيمَٰنِ فَتَكۡفُرُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
